sentences.en: About 14 % of those receiving thee - mail removed information on lexical sexual behavior.
sentences.cn: 大约有14%的人收到了 电子邮件,他们替换了关于性行为的信息.

sentences.en: Compiler Construction Principles, based on the JAVA realize, lexical analysis.
sentences.cn: 编译原理, 基于JAVA实现, 词法分析.

sentences.en: Deviat ion in lexical meaning is a common phenomenon int ranslat ion.
sentences.cn: 词义偏离是翻译中常见的一种现象.

sentences.en: For example, are overlaps in word meaning, or lexical gaps, being explored?
sentences.cn: 例如, 是词汇意义交叉, 还是词汇之间具有差距?

sentences.en: Garden path sentences are caused either by lexical ambiguity or syntactic ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 花园小径句式的产生或是词汇歧义所致,或是由句法歧义带来.

sentences.en: In this homework, you will explore corpus - based approaches to lexical semantics.
sentences.cn: 在此家庭作业中, 同学需要探讨基于语料的方法在辞汇语义上的应用.

sentences.en: Lexical analyzer function is an input source, output word symbols.
sentences.cn: 词法分析器的功能是输入源程序, 输出单词符号.

sentences.en: Perspective taking is closely related to the process of lexical choice.
sentences.cn: 视角的选取与词汇选择过程密切相关.

sentences.en: Semantics is generally divided into lexical semantics and sentence semantics.
sentences.cn: 语义学一般分为词汇语义学和句子语义学.

sentences.en: Some acronyms as scientific terminology are used as a lexical item.
sentences.cn: 一些科学术语缩写用作词汇项目.

sentences.en: The lexical meaning is the content of the vocabulary.
The scanner is sometimes called a lexical analyzer.
sentences.cn: 扫描程序有时又把它称为词法分析程序.

sentences.en: The theory of lexical cohesion is obviously quite useful to English teaching.
sentences.cn: 词汇衔接模式理论对英语教学具有明显的指导作用.

sentences.en: This is the lexical analysis of the design stage.
sentences.cn: 本设计即为词法分析阶段.

sentences.en: We chose a few of the commonest lexical items in the languages.
sentences.cn: 我们选取了各语言中最常见的几个词汇。
